instructions.1: In 10-inch nonstick skillet, mix cooked beef and barbecue sauce. Heat over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, until hot.
instructions.2: Pull each biscuit apart into 2 layers; press each into 4-inch round. Place 1 round in each of 8 greased regular-size muffin cups. Firmly press in bottom and up side, forming 1/4-inch rim. Fill with beef mixture; sprinkle with cheese.
instructions.3: Bake at 375 degrees F 13 to 15 minutes or until edges of biscuits are golden brown. Cool 1 minute; remove from pan.

questions.question: Is each biscuit from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is beef mixture live after Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we mix (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
